RatMeX
Java API Documentation

  • SEARCH: 
 

Uses of Package
stincmale.ratmex.executor

  • Packages that use stincmale.ratmex.executor 
    Package Description
    stincmale.ratmex.executor
    Contains tools for executing tasks with a fixed rate.
  • Classes in stincmale.ratmex.executor used by stincmale.ratmex.executor 
    Class Description
    DefaultRateListener
    A default implementation of RateListener which throws RateFailedException if notices that the target rate is not respected.
    DefaultSubmitterWorkerRateListener
    A default implementation of RateListener which throws RateFailedException if notices that the target rate is not respected by either submitter or worker.
    Rate
    A representation of a rate.
    RateFailedException
    See RateListener.onMeasurement(RateMeasuredEvent).
    RateListener
    A listener allowing monitoring the rate and reacting if there are deviations from the target rate.
    RateMeasuredEvent
    A container with data provided to RateListener by RateMeasuringExecutorService.
    RateMeasuringExecutorService
    A Rate-Measuring eXecutor service (hence RatMeX) which not only executes tasks with a fixed rate, but also measures the actual rate completion of the tasks and allows one to monitor the rate and react if the executor has failed to conform to the target rate.
    ScheduledTaskConfig
    A configuration of a scheduled task.
    ScheduledTaskConfig.Builder  
    SubmitterWorkerRateMeasuredEvent
    A container with data provided to RateListener by SubmitterWorkerRateMeasuringExecutorService.
    SubmitterWorkerScheduledTaskConfig
    A configuration of a scheduled task for SubmitterWorkerRateMeasuringExecutorService.
    SubmitterWorkerScheduledTaskConfig.Builder
